title: Gallery Show
content:
Have had the honor of being asked to show in a Nantucket gallery starting this weekend and running through September. Have to admit, I am flying high tonight. It's been a day full of wonderful news that ended with an incredible sunset and myriads of fireflies surrounding our house.

Thanks for letting me share the news!

Sharon
author: Sharon Van Lieu

comments.content:
I went to your site yesterday... your work is stunning!

Good for you  
Michael
